biotools.summary: MISTIC (MISsense deleTeriousness predICtor), a prediction tool to reveal disease-relevant deleterious missense variants based on an original combination of two complementary machine learning algorithms using a soft voting system that integrates 113 missense features, ranging from multi-ethnic minor allele frequencies and evolutionary conservation, to physiochemical and biochemical properties of amino acids.

bioschemas.name: MISTIC
